name: Poopy Bird AR: Poop and Run
name_original: Poopy Bird AR: Poop and Run
description:
Imagine you are a bird. You fly around the city, pooping on people, cars, buildings... Of course you cannot do that in real life but you can try in this game!

Why play Poopy Bird?
- Funny and challenging game play
- Better experience with AR (for compatible devices)
- High score competition via Leaderboard
